copied_from.display_value: TC - 292 - Dayforce Request - New Access - Rejected by Manager - ITIL

sys_atf_test.description:
Keywords: Onestream, Approval, Approve, Access, Request Description: Validate onestream approval process below. Before approved Approval = requested State = Pending Approval Assignment Group = Blank Correct Short Description Manager approval task generated
After approved Approval = Approved State= Open Assignment Group Populated Approval Doc'd in History Task(s) Generated
Complete Tasks RITM Approval = Approved State= Open Assignment Group Populated Approval Doc'd in History RITM Closed REQ Closed
sys_atf_test.name: TC - 293 - Dayforce Request - New Access - Rejected After Manager - ITIL
